name: Skeleton Archer
flavor: A fragile skeleton with a shortbow and arrows.

features.name: Opportunist - Passive
features.desc: When two or more adversaries are within Very Close range of a creature, all damage they each deal to that creature is doubled.

features.name: Deadly Shot - Action
features.desc: Make an attack against a Vulnerable target within Far range. On a success, mark a Stress to deal 3d4+8 physical damage.
